about_the_game:
Boomer Shooter Soul in TPS Roguelike's Flesh

You have probably played a lot of roguelike and lite games and Third Person Shooters. And maybe a fair share of Boomer Shooters as well. DEMONICA encapsulates the gameplay of ultra-fast-paced Boomer Shooters in a Third Person Shooter Roguelike's perspective. Swap your weapons, slash your enemies in half, and manage your ammo and health, all while on the ever-changing levels — every time you enter the stage.



You Were Slayed. Now Slay Them Back.

The Fiend Lord conquered the world and took the princess from the kingdom. The kingdom has appointed you and your friends to save her, only resulting in the slaughter of your whole party. But, you have been given a second chance. The princess is dead, you are erased from the record, and your body is composed of machines cursed with weaponry made of fiend body parts. Now, nothing is holding you back. Slay until the blood of the evil Fiend Lord soaks your half-machine half-human flesh. Show those filthy fiends who the real DEMON is.



Choose Your Own Path

In DEMONICA, you select your own routes based on the upgrades and resources you need to reach the Castle. You can choose to detour around an area that you want to avoid to save your resources, or just go straight to the Fiend Castle and embrace the challenge of slaughtering whatever comes through your enraged path.

16 Enemy Classes, 64 Enemy Types


Your rage-filled journey to the Fiend Lord won't be so easy. You will confront HUNDREDS of fiends on your adventure, composed of 64 unique Fiend types having their own move sets, attack patterns, and health types. You will need to learn to deal with each of them in the most efficient way possible, in order to gain the crucial advantage on your enemies.

short_description: Boomer Third Person Shooter Rogueilike. Swap your weapons and slash to replenish your resources. Learn the enemy's attack patterns and health types, then, determine the best way to slay them based on your current battle status. Every combat encounter is unique in the ever-changing land of DEMONICA.
